p: EV-A71 viral RNA was isolated using NucleoSpin RNA kit (Macherey-Nagel) according to the manufacturer’s protocol. The following primers and probe were used for EV-A71 BrCr qRT-PCR: EV-A71 forward primer 5’ CCGCATTGAACCACTGTAATTT 3’, reverse primer 5’ GGAGCCAACGTGATAGTGATAG 3’ and probe 56-FAM/ACTATTGGT/ZEN/GGTGCCTATCA/3IABKFQ
